reviews.customers_say: Customers love this sweater's soft, fuzzy material and appreciate its comfort, noting it's not at all itchy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most amazing sweater ever
items.body: So soft so comfy perfect arm length the perfect oversized fit the material is warm and not too thick the style and fit again just can't get enough of it's not too heavy it still has some stretch to it but again oversized so it's perfect the quality 10 of of 10 no complaints I love love love this sweater will be getting one every color Read more
items.author: Stephanie arispe

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and pretty sweater, feels like great quality fabric
items.body: I love this sweater! I did order my regular size of XL and it was too big. I sent it back and ordered the L. It is only slightly smaller but it'll work! All that to say, it is oversized. It's a comfortable, flattering cut. The sleeves are wide at the wrist, which took me some time to get used to, but in the end I do like them. The fabric is so soft and pretty. I just adore it. I bought the white to wear with a red skirt for a Christmas party. This sweater would also lend itself to a casual look, with jeans. I am trying to stop myself from grabbing it in more colors. I don't need any more sweaters, but I have to say, this is my favorite sweater in my wardrope. One more note, it came compressed and with fold marks. A trip through the laundry took care of that perfectly. Read more
items.author: Cindy E

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft, pretty sweater
items.body: I'm tall and it fits really nicely, but I have long arms and the sleeves are a little short. Pretty color! Very soft and comfortable. Read more
items.author: Babydoll

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy oversized sweater!
items.body: This is a staple! I bought 2! It is Cozy, soft, easy to wash. Great with jeans, leggings, and boots. My go to sweater and I grab it 2x a week to wear. Read more
items.author: Denise Watters

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfy.
items.body: Cute, soft, fit is perfect, quality is good, worth the purchase, hasn't broken at all, layers well, and isn't heavy enough to be bothersome but still has a nice weight to it that makes it extra comfortable. Read more
items.author: A Pig of Sorts

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great material Sleeves to baggy
items.body: The media could not be loaded. SUPER SOFT! Love the material but it‚Äôs to oversized I would size down I‚Äôm in a medium - I am 5‚Äô2 tall and 148 lbs and I feel like it‚Äôs swallowing me. I also get triggered by weird things and the oversized sleeve I can tell is going to drive me nuts and get in my way Read more
items.author: Begeee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy sweater but colors don‚Äôt match photos well
items.body: Easy oversized sweater to throw on and it is comparable to Barefoot Dreams though maybe not quite as soft. Photo left to right: light purple, navy blue, and dark gray. But you do need to be a little patient or not picky about color and fit. I ended up ordering 3, and keeping the third. Fits varied - sleeve length, overall length and width. Colors were really off from online photos - light purple was more pinky-taupe, didn‚Äôt get a purple vibe at all and it washed me out, navy was closer to a royal blue imo. Weirdest part was softness varied by color too, light purple was really soft (closest to barefoot dreams soft) but navy was noticeable less soft. Dark gray was somewhere in the middle and is the color I ended up keeping. I felt like the darker color dressed it up a bit and I could wear it wfh or to a casual dinner out. Weight of it is nice too, you‚Äôre cozy and warm but without getting too hot. Read more
items.author: Ryan W.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pink is perfect üëåüèº baby pink, I feel like Barbie in it!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Soft, comfortable, beautiful color. I got a medium in coral pink and it‚Äôs exactly the baby pink I was looking for. Def a Barbie pink so I‚Äôm happy it wasn‚Äôt in anyway orangey or too cream colored. Perfect a baby pink, adorable. It is a little darker (by a touch) from what the image portrays but nothing that changes the look. If you want something more creamy it‚Äôs not, it‚Äôs exactly the color of baby pink. Not many reviews showed the color so hopefully my review helps!! People talk about the size but I got my normal size (M), I could have gone smaller but then it wouldn‚Äôt have been the slouchy look which is what this sweater is supposed to look like. It fits me how it looks like on the model. I‚Äôm a 36B in bra size if any one needs that too for reference. Fabric is unbelievably soft, I feel like I‚Äôm in a perfect blanket it‚Äôs amazing. Happy with this purchase, I think the videos don‚Äôt show the white enough in the color but in person, you‚Äôll see for yourself. It‚Äôs adorable. Read more
items.author: Amazolex

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Camel Black Stripe, Light Khaki - Yellow Tan, Nutmeg, Dark Khaki, Fuchsia, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Dark Gray, Orange, Almond - Parchment, Lake Blue, Rust - Birck Red, Lake- Green Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
